# Debug message
MESSAGE(STATUS "Add subdirectory [${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}]")
set(NET_SRC_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
# google libraries

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(clog)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(cpuinfo)
#ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(eigen)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(gemmlowp)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(flatbuffers)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(farmhash)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(ruy)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(fft2d)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(tensorflow/lite)

IF(ECHO_PLATFORM_WINDOWS)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(protobuf-3.21.6/src/google/protobuf)
ENDIF()

IF(ECHO_EDITOR_MODE)
	ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(googletest)
ENDIF()
